data.prayer: Father, help the 50,075 believers in Ivano-Frankivs'k to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ivano-Frankivs‘k, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ivano-Frankivs‘k, Ukraine. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 110 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Ivano-Frankivs‘k, Ukraine.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, move the 50,075 believers in the state of Ivano-Frankivs'k to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ivano-Frankivs‘k, Ukraine to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Orok people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Ivano-Frankivs‘k, Ukraine.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Ivano-Frankivs‘k, Ukraine the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Ivano-Frankivs‘k, Ukraine to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
